DATA.description: Allows to read part master data and aggregated elements.
DATA.name: Part: Read Master Data

DATA.description: Allows to write part master data and aggregated elements.
DATA.name: Part: Write Master Data

DATA.description: Allows to categorise parts. The categorisation of a part determines e.g. its Object Lifecycle and Access Rights.
DATA.name: Part: Categorize

DATA.description: Allows to change the status of Documents.
DATA.name: Part: Change of Status

DATA.description: Allows to use the Platform's Batch Operation functionality for e.g. the revision of multiple parts.
DATA.name: Part: Batch Operations

DATA.description: Allows to define exceptional authorizations for parts.
DATA.name: Part: Exceptional Authorizations

DATA.description: Allows access to the parts Web UI
DATA.name: Part: Web UI
